name: Quick Black Bean Soup
author: Jenny Wells
summary: Quick and easy black bean soup. Substitute vegetable broth for chicken broth and omit sour cream to make vegetarian.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, drained
directions: Drain some of the liquid from 2 cans black beans

Put 2 cans black beans, diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, 1 cup chicken broth, cumin, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper into a blender and blend until smooth; pour into a saucepan and add remaining chicken broth and 1 can black beans
Place saucepan over medium heat, bring mixture to a simmer, and cook for 15 minutes
Put 1/2 cup hot rice into each of 6 bowls
Ladle soup over rice and top with 1 tablespoon sour cream
